lines.text: I like you, Richard. I like you alot. And sometimes, I even get pleasure from sleeping with you. A great deal of pleasure. But you don't own me; nobody owns me.
Brian, darling, would you be very careful wrapping this vase for Lady Chasen?
It is such a lovely vase. You know, I really feel as though I were selling my own child. Which of course, I would if the price was right.
What can I do for you ladies?
